content: pdf digital crochet pattern get ready for fall with modern and stylish mosaic mittens mosaic crochet is a quick and easy technique to create beautiful colorwork patterns the modish mosaic mittens will quickly become a family favorite in sizing from toddler to adult difficulty intermediate technique mosaic crochet written in standard american terms toddler child adult wool of the andes worsted weight by wecrochet 100% peruvian highland wool 110yds/50g yarn a required balls 1 2 2 yarn b required balls 1 1 1 https //shrsl com/2hppz 4mm/g & 5mm/h cookies n cream furls crochet hook or hook needed to obtain gauge https //bit ly/3nypup9 scissors tapestry needle mosaic pattern 8 sts and 8 row = 2 in pattern band 9 sts and 9 row = 2 in single_crochet blo you re welcome to sell your finished items from this pattern when selling items online i would love you to reference me as the designer you must use your own photos to sell your work all my images are copyright protected and cannot be used to sell your items
